features: Durable: HonHey Portable handheld fan was built with a durable brushless motor inside which is able to provide a working life of 15,000 hours which is 7 times longer than the most mini fan. Designed with a No-Foldable handle for preventing the handle from being broken which is the common defective design of the most foldable portable fan.

High-Performance Battery: The battery fan is operated by a 2000mAh premium Rechargeable battery with high performance and efficiency.Offers you the most continuous working time with 10 hours depending on different wind speeds. Compared with the same capacity, Our battery exceeds 20% of the working time more than others. You can bring this handheld mini hand fan for stroll, shopping, or other outdoor activities without worrying about the battery.

You Can Control Wind: With 4 adjustable wind speeds, you can control wind volume from nature, slow, medium, and fast according to different needs. You can enjoy quite a breeze from slow & natural speed, tender wind at medium and fastest speeds is the best helper for hot flashes. Our handheld fan is the “GAME CHANGER” for dry eyelash skin cream and spray when you need a small portable hand held fan for applying makeup.

Work While Charging: Get power supply from USB devices such as powerbank, computers, laptops, and USB chargers.HonHey handheld portable fan is able to continue work when it connects with a power supply. Places into the base(included), it can become a normal hand desk fan. Takes 2 hours to get fully charged.

Portable Size: HonHey personal fan is designed with a portable weight of 8.8oz and mini szie:4.3*2.8*8.8inch. Easy to carry and store for you. Also is an ideal handheld fan for hot flashes summer traveling camping gifts for kids women and friends. Ideal for Office & Travel & Dry Eyelash. Package list: 1 HonHey Mini Portable Handheld Fan;1 type-C USB Cable;1 User instruction paper; 1-year warranty service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: G3 Portable Fan, Mini Hand Held Fan with USB Rechargeable Battery, 4 Speed Personal Cooling Fan for Women, Girls and Kids.
Previous page Next page 1 Battery-life Display 2 Adjustable 4 speeds 3 Easy To Charge

Strong Wind Built with a durable brushless motor, make it has a high rotation speed up to 4000RPM, bringing a strong & cool wind to you. Portable Size HonHey personal fan is designed with a portable weight of 8.8oz and size of 4.3*2.8*8.8inch. A lightweight mini handheld fan is easy to carry outside and store in your bag.

Work as a makeup desk fan The personal fan has a removable base, it can become a mini desk fan when places our handheld fan into its base. It's a perfect eyelash fan for you to dry your lashes. Support to set on sideways With a small corner design on the right side, so that our G3 handheld fan can be placed sideways. When you need to dry nail polish, this makeup fan can be your great makeup assistant.

More Product Details About HonHey G3 Handheld Fan Four Indicator Lights The light is white when working and charging. 4 lights are on when charging is complete. The first light flashes when the battery is lower than 10%. Type C Charging Port Support work while charging, no heat during using. Compatibility is great, at present, can match most power banks, computers, cars, etc. Non-slip Base The base of the handheld fan is equipped with non-slip pads to increase friction for a firmer placement on the desktop. 2000mAh Rechargeable Battery 2000mAh Rechargeable battery ensures longer use time and the working hours can be 8-10 hours.

Is this a battery operated fan? Yes, this mini handheld fan has a built-in 2000mAh rechargeable battery with long battery life. How to change the wind speed of this handheld fan? Only need to press the button to change the wind speeds. Simple operation. What is the working time of this portable fan? It can provide 3-10 working hours according to different speeds. The first speed is 10 hours, the second speed is 6 hours, the third speed is 4 hours and the fourth speed is 3 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This little fan is fantastic. It is just right at the first setting and very powerful at the highest setting. This is great for my hot flashes at night. I don’t have to freeze the entire family by turning on the AC. I runs for a long time. I keep mine plugged in because I use it so much. I like that I can leave it on my nightstand or take it with me in the car. I can always recharge it in my car if needed. I highly recommend this mini fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this fan! I've had it for a few months now and use it everyday! I love how it has the stand to keep it standing upright it makes it easy to grab it! It's super lightweight! It has multiple settings and it is super powerful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fan is easy to carry with you.
reviews.reviewText: I love the quietness of the fan when I'm at an event, ad well as keeping me cool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best little fan ever
reviews.reviewText: I love this fan. It has 4 speeds and it’s quiet. I use it to dry my make up, mascara, to cool off. It’s wonderful. Very portable. And I love that it comes with a stand. I just leave the stand on at all times. It’s not awkward. It’s easy to charge and the charge has held for 5 days already. I got the grey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and convenient
reviews.reviewText: This is so convenient, it’s not too small, not too big. Battery life is great, and you get a good breeze out of it. I even bought a second one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic little fan
reviews.reviewText: First and foremost, I do love this little fan. I bought it because the hot flashes and night sweats were getting the best of me. I keep it under a pillow on my bed at night so its right there when I need it. One night I put it back under the pillow and bumped the power button accidentally and turned it back on. The next morning I was looking for it thinking it had fallen off the bed but it was still under the pillow and it was *still* going!I carry this fan wherever I go and its really been a game changer for me. It is small and light, fits into my purse. It has a great battery life and it is quiet, rechargeable and has 4 speeds, wonderful strength of air flow. Comes with a stand so you can also use it hands free. I also use it to dry facial serums and masks.I like it better than the ones that hang around the neck. They may be completely hands free but when I'm having a hot flash I can direct a pretty strong breeze exactly where I need it. (Those who have experienced it will KNOW what I mean) Several reviewers have mentioned that it is weak but that has not been my personal experience.Which brings us to the one flaw that drives me absolutely nuts. That power/speed button. Ugh. If it had a dedicated power switch it would be perfect. It is just way too easy to turn it on by accident. I have to be really careful how I put it in my purse and make sure the button is against something flat or it will get bumped and turn on. Its quiet so I never notice til I look in my purse. I don't mind that sort of button for the speed. No issues there but maybe a little switch somewhere to turn it off and on and can't be turned on by accident. I'm taking off one star for that aggravation but other than that I absolutely love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are great!
reviews.reviewText: These were a great purchase for med spa services. I think they are pretty high tech

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, strong winded fan
reviews.reviewText: I just want to say I love these fans. In fact, I bought 3 different colors in these fans. I use one in my bathroom, in the kitchen, and take one with me in the car in case I need to take it somewhere.My only issue is the base stands. They are great at keeping the fans upright, however I ended up losing all 3 of these bases.I reached out to customer service. They are amazing! They responded to my message on Amazon within 24 hours. Not only did they send replacements for all 3 bases, but they sent me 3 new fans altogether- which I did not ask for. I would’ve been happy with just purchasing replacement bases, however this company went above and beyond. 100% customer satisfaction!!As for the fans themselves, perfect size, portable, pretty colors, charges in very little time with a C type cord, and has 3 speeds, all which are more than sufficient at doing it’s job for such a small fan. I live in Las Vegas, so any extra “air conditioning” is always helpful!
El Led del ventilador enciende en rojo cuando se pone a cargar. Después de un par de horas no se ha cargado nada la batería.
Great little fan to keep on my desk at work. Fairly quiet and 4 speeds.

The media could not be loaded. This portable fan has 4 different settings (see video posted). All settings work great. A cord is provided to charge it. So far (it’s been a few weeks) this fan has been amazing! It holds battery life well, and didn’t take too long to charge. I use this fan on a daily basis and I’ve only charged it once. The product is the exact same as shown in the photos. I have tested a few different fans and this is by far my favourite. Doesn’t feel like cheap quality either. I will update this review if the fan stops working :)

reviews.reviewTitle: Gerät aufgestellt Stromversorgung angeschlossen dann funktioniert alles - wunderbar
reviews.reviewText: Ein guter Einkauf - Akku geladen und die beschriebene Funktion waren vorhanden - super. Das Gerät wurde schneller geliefert als angekündigt

reviews.reviewTitle: Decent fan. USBC is a plus.
reviews.reviewText: It’s an OK fan. Nothing special really. I have much smaller units that move more air. This one charges via USBC which saves me carrying an extra cable so that’s a plus.
